message: This offer leaves us both with a good amount, Bob. Let's wrap this up!
Alice, my turn!  I'm feeling more ambitious this round.  Let's make a deal - this offer gets us both a good chunk of change.
Bob, let's be realistic. This offer is the best you'll get considering the inflation working against you.
